703910.name: VRpatients
703910.description: In this free version of VRpatients, you’ll care for sick patients and have the chance to practice fundamental clinical skills like listening to lung sounds on the Meta Quest or HTC VIVE headset. It’s an engaging, hands-on glimpse into professional healthcare where anyone can learn essential skills and discover what it’s really like to be a nurse or paramedic.
703910.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲
*具有完全音频支持的语言
